doc.previous: The Bangladesh Sports Control Board, responsible for promoting sports activities across the nation is based in Dhaka. Dhaka also has stadiums largely used for domestic events such as the Bangladesh Army Stadium, the Bir Sherestha Shaheed Shipahi Mostafa Kamal Stadium, the Dhanmondi Cricket Stadium and the Outer Stadium Ground.[107] The Dhaka University Ground and The BUET Sports Ground host many intercollegiate tournaments.[108] They are also used as practice ground by different football clubs and visiting foreign national football teams.
